00011 // Inherit from this to get threading.  The usage is:
00012 //     threaded.start()
00013 //     threaded.join()
00014 // Implement the run() function as the thread.
00015 class Threaded {
00016     public:
00017         Threaded();
00018         virtual void start();
00019         virtual void stop();
00020         void join();
00021     protected:
00022         volatile bool stopRequested;
00023         volatile bool running;
00024     private:
00025         virtual void run() = 0;
00026         boost::shared_ptr<boost::thread> runThread; 
00027 };

00030 struct fltknotify{
00031     boost::mutex m;
00032     boost::condition cond;
00033     Fl_Window *win;
00034 };

00038 class FLTKThread : public Threaded{
00039     private:
00040     boost::mutex vector_lock;
00041     std::vector<fltknotify*> to_notify;
00042     boost::mutex window_lock;
00043     std::vector<ImageWindow*> windows;
00044 
00045     public:
00046     FLTKThread();
00047     void run();
00048 
00049     friend class FLTKManager;
00050 };

00056     static void block_until_closed(Fl_Window* win);
